sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnonlinemanual ( online_mnl_id , online_mnl_se_code , online_mnl_dfn , online_mnl_dc , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , online_mnl_nm ) VALUES ( #onlineMnlId# , #onlineMnlSeCode# , #onlineMnlDfn# , #onlineMnlDc# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE() , #onlineMnlNm# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnonlinemanual SET online_mnl_id = #onlineMnlId# , online_mnl_se_code = #onlineMnlSeCode# , online_mnl_dfn = #onlineMnlDfn# , online_mnl_dc = #onlineMnlDc# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() , online_mnl_nm = #onlineMnlNm# WHERE 1 = 1 AND online_mnl_id = #onlineMnlId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnonlinemanual WHERE 1 = 1 AND online_mnl_id = #onlineMnlId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT online_mnl_id , online_mnl_se_code , online_mnl_dfn , online_mnl_dc , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , online_mnl_nm FROM comtnonlinemanual WHERE online_mnl_id = #onlineMnlId#

SELECT online_mnl_id , online_mnl_se_code , online_mnl_dfn , online_mnl_dc , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , online_mnl_nm FROM comtnonlinemanual WHERE 1=1
online_mnl_id = #searchKeyword#
online_mnl_se_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY online_mnl_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnonlinemanual WHERE 1=1
online_mnl_id = #searchKeyword#
online_mnl_se_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
